definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 354:a. [[[חַרְטׂם]]]: the fact that the word is alw. applied to Egypt. magicians, exc. Da 2:2 (late), suggests Egypt. origin, but no agreement among Egyptologists: Harkavy:Jas., 1870, Mars-Avril, 169 prop. xar, speak + tum, hidden = teller of hidden things; Wied:Samml 44 thinks Heb. word perh. imitating an Egypt. cher-ṭem-t, he who holds the book; FC Cook:’Speaker’s’ Comm. i. 279 prop. cher-tum=bearer of sacred words
